comment:
играется на пропсе бродяги (погиб после реинфорса Faith в Beggar_dialogue), 
если поднят флаг BeggarUnarmed

languages.text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а из запястья торчит встроенное в него окровавленное лезвие, которым он явно успел нанести удар по противнику.

traits.locale_text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а из запястья торчит встроенное в него окровавленное лезвие, которым он явно успел нанести удар по противнику.

languages.text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.
languages.original_text: Истерзанный труп бродяги, похитившего ваши ботинки. Его губы сложены в умиротворенную улыбку, а из запястья торчит встроенное в него окровавленное лезвие, которым он явно успел нанести удар по противнику.

traits.locale_text: The ravaged corpse of the vagabond who stole your boots. There is a peaceful smile on his lips, and a bloodied blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

The ravaged corpse of the vagabond who stole your boots. There is a peaceful smile on his lips, and a bloodied blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

languages.text: あなたのブーツを盗んだ乞食のボロボロの死体。彼の唇は穏やかな笑みを浮かべ、手首に取り付けられた装置からは血に染まった刃物が突き出ている。死ぬ前に犯人を刺すことができたようだ。
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: あなたのブーツを盗んだ乞食のボロボロの死体。彼の唇は穏やかな笑みを浮かべ、手首に取り付けられた装置からは血に染まった刃物が突き出ている。死ぬ前に犯人を刺すことができたようだ。

languages.text: 偷走你靴子的乞丐倒在地上，尸体残破不堪。他的嘴角挂着安详的微笑，血迹斑斑的刀片从他手腕上的装置刺了出来。看得出来，他在临死前应该刺死了杀害他的人。
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: 偷走你靴子的乞丐倒在地上，尸体残破不堪。他的嘴角挂着安详的微笑，血迹斑斑的刀片从他手腕上的装置刺了出来。看得出来，他在临死前应该刺死了杀害他的人。

languages.text: El cadáver destrozado del mendigo que te robó las botas. Sus labios forman una sonrisa serena y una cuchilla manchada de sangre sobresale de un dispositivo construido alrededor de su muñeca. Parece que consiguió apuñalar a su asesino antes de morir.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver destrozado del mendigo que te robó las botas. Sus labios forman una sonrisa serena y una cuchilla manchada de sangre sobresale de un dispositivo construido alrededor de su muñeca. Parece que consiguió apuñalar a su asesino antes de morir.

languages.text: Die entstellte Leiche des Bettlers, der deine Stiefel gestohlen hat. Seine Lippen formen ein friedliches Lächeln, und aus einem Gerät um sein Handgelenk ragt eine blutgefleckte Klinge. Offenbar ist es ihm vor seinem Tod gelungen, seinen Mörder mit dem Messer zu verwunden.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: Die entstellte Leiche des Bettlers, der deine Stiefel gestohlen hat. Seine Lippen formen ein friedliches Lächeln, und aus einem Gerät um sein Handgelenk ragt eine blutgefleckte Klinge. Offenbar ist es ihm vor seinem Tod gelungen, seinen Mörder mit dem Messer zu verwunden.

languages.text: Le corps ravagé du mendiant qui vous avait volé vos bottes. Un sourire serein aux lèvres, il arbore au poignet un appareil dont émerge une lame tachée de sang. Il semblerait qu'il soit parvenu à poignarder son assassin avant de mourir.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: Le corps ravagé du mendiant qui vous avait volé vos bottes. Un sourire serein aux lèvres, il arbore au poignet un appareil dont émerge une lame tachée de sang. Il semblerait qu'il soit parvenu à poignarder son assassin avant de mourir.

languages.text: Botlarını çalan dilencinin harap olmuş cesedi. Dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme var. Bileğindeki cihazdan kanlı bir bıçak çıkıntı yapıyor. Ölmeden önce katilini bıçaklamayı başarmış gibi duruyor.
languages.original_text: The ravaged corpse of the beggar who stole your boots. His lips form a serene smile, and a blood-stained blade protrudes from a device built around his wrist. It would seem he managed to stab his killer before his death.

traits.locale_text: Botlarını çalan dilencinin harap olmuş cesedi. Dudaklarında huzurlu bir gülümseme var, bileğindeki cihazdan kanlı bir bıçak çıkıntı yapıyor. Ölmeden önce katilini bıçaklamayı başarmış gibi duruyor.
